mapper.insert: insert into TEPicture (PictureID, PicturePath, PictureName, PictureSuffix) values (#{pictureID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{picturePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update TEPicture set PicturePath = #{picturePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PictureName = #{pictureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PictureSuffix = #{pictureSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PictureID = #{pictureID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select PictureID, PicturePath, PictureName, PictureSuffix from TEPicture where PictureID = #{pictureID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select PictureID, PicturePath, PictureName, PictureSuffix from TEPicture
